channel.title: Books on 2D Steve
channel.description: Recent content in Books on 2D Steve

item.title: Book Juggling
item.description: I haven’t been keeping up with the reading list. I also haven’t been keeping up with this blog.

item.title: The Reading List: Not a Fan
item.description: _The Reading List is a segment of the blog where I let you know the thing I just read and some thoughts about it along with the next book in my list.

item.title: Reading List Update
item.description: If you follow along with my reading list, you know that I planned to read One Thousand Risks by Chad Johnson.

item.title: Manvotionals
item.description: I picked up a book the other day called “Manvotionals” by Brett & Kate McKay.

item.title: The Name of the Wind
item.description: I listened to a guy on a podcast today talking about how he blogged every single day.

item.title: I'm a Robot
item.description: The newest old Weezer album is amazing and I wish I had picked it up before.

item.title: Reading With My Ears
item.description: I don’t know about you guys, but in this culture where we have less and less time to do anything, one of the things I miss the most is having time to sit down and read a book.

item.title: The Lost Symbol
item.description: I just finished the latest book by critically acclaimed author Dan Brown, and I totally loved it!

item.title: Stupid People Bug Me
item.description: So an interesting little tidbit popped up in the news the other day and has forced the crazy folk out into the wild again with their stupid theories and ridiculous assumptions.

item.title: The Reign of Evil is Over
